modName: Assassins Creed style glass bow -Darker version released-
summary: Glass bow in Assassins Creed colours.
descriptionHtml:
My first re-texture, thought I\'d do something to go with the assassins creed mod for nightingale armour. 
-----------------------
»»Upadates to come««
»Daedric version
»Colour synchronization with AC style nightingale armour
-----------------------
To get a glass bow, open dev console and type this in (will make a .txt file if any would like one)
player.additem 000139a5 
-----------------------
Installation
1. Add \'textures\' folder to Skyrim data folder
2.Done
-----------------------
Removal
1. Remove texture folder or delete the .dds file if you have other mods
-----------------------
author: Munchise
